thread.title: Speedster Terrance Gore remains in ALCS lineup
thread.title_full: Speedster Terrance Gore remains in ALCS lineup - KCTV5

author: DeAnn Smith, Digital Content Manager
title: Speedster Terrance Gore remains in ALCS lineup
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - Party like it's the ALDS.
The Kansas City Royals announced Friday that they aren't making any changes to their lineup for the ALCS.
That means speedster Terrance Gore can again change the game by coming into the late innings as a pinch runner. Jonny Gomez who the Royals traded for this summer will remain on the bench as an inspirational leader.
Gore hadn't been caught stealing in the big leagues until Monday's game against the Astros, and that took a controversial official review.
The Royals send out Edinson Volquez as their starting pitcher while the Blue Jays counter with Marco Estrada.
First pitch is scheduled for 7:07 p.m. at Kauffman Stadium. We want to send your tailgating photos. Email them to yourphotos@kctv5.com or post them on Twitter with the hashtag #CrownCrazy.
